help-file.title: "SONG OF HEROISM"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: Group Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of singer Type of song: Generic
"Song of heroism" elevates the amount of adrenaline produced by those in the group, increasing their combat abilities. As the bard becomes more skillful in this song, it can also cause those in his/her group to move much quicker in combat.
